name: Uncover Your Story
description:
Uncover your story is a Solo TTRPG game based on the game Pyramid Solitaire.

Slowly uncover cards from the pyramid as you tell your story; Will you prevail, or is your character headed for a bad end?

Thanks to Aaron and Thomas for playtesting the initial version of the game on our fortnightly  playtest meetups. Check their stuff out @ehronlime and @chaibypost !
